infotexts.entitydescription.WR_baton: Often seen in the hands of officers and wardens; useful for discipline or moving prisoners.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_dynamite: Not to be confused with TNT, this explosive is used for mining or blowing holes in enemy fortifications.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_landmine: General purpose landmine. Turns invisible after 2.5 secs of being on the ground and then becomes active; can be picked up. Useful for slowing down enemy advances or preventing movement over an area.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_basicpistol: Trusty sidearm with blueprints so prevalent that it became standard for both the Coalition and Renegades.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_flamethrower: A backpack tank fill with treated gasoline piped to a nozzle ignition system. Useful for area denial and shock tactics.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_basicmachinegun: A large mounted machine gun converted to a man portable weapon; useful for suppression. Can feed from belt boxes or raw belts. Bipod allows for better accuracy at the cost of speed.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_machinegunmag: Box containing 50 rounds of machine gun rounds.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_basicrifle: Blot-action, 6 round maganize, shortened length rifle for infantry use. Uses full power rounds.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_smg: Roughly engineered, open-blot automatic firearm. Uses submachine gun maganizes.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_signalflare: A small flare desighed to fire out of a flare gun for calling artillery strikes.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_flaregun: Uses signaling flares to call down artillery. Can't be used in bases.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_smallround: Low caliber round ideal for handguns and submachine guns.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_largeround: Standard caliber for use in longguns such as rifles and machineguns.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_shotgunround: Large caliber buckshot shell, only used in shotguns.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_smallroundmag20: A box mag designed for holding 20 pistol cartridges for use in submachine guns.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_trenchingtool: A simple tool used to erect fortifications or dig trenchs.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_constructiontool: Used to repair Walls, takes basic materals.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_minedetector: Military grade metal detector built for the purpose of finding mines. Hold right click to scan.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_barbedwire_setup: Metal beams with barb wire wrapped around. Hold down right click to start building.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_sandbag_setup: A pallet loaded with empty sandbags. Hold down right click to start building.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_medkit: A small metal container designed to carry medical supplies.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_medbag: A medical kit that carries large medical items. Can be wore as a bag.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_revolverammobox: A small box that holds 60 rounds of revolver ammo.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_rifleammobox: A box that holds 40 rounds of rifle ammo.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_shotgunammobox: A box that holds 40 rounds of shotgun ammo.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_cuffs: Rope handcuffs, crude but effective at restraining prisoners.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_whistle: Small metal whistle, used for issuing offensive orders.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_gong: Makeshift gong composed of a empty shell casing and a wooden bat. Used for alerting of enemy movements.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_radio: Remote voice communications device. Messages can only be received when held. Has a ping feature to alert radios on the same frequency of a incoming message (waiting 2-3 secs after pinging before sending a message is ideal).
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_stretcher: Designed to carryed by one person, this equipment makes transporting injured and bodies easier. Allow characters to be carryed at full speed.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_bag: Equipment that carries extra anything of bluk. Provides two slots to carry large items along with other normal ones.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_dogtag: A small metal piece ingrave with your name, date of birth and battalion; just incase your face (or entire body) is destroyed.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_coalitionhelmet: Standard issue steel helmet. Protective against artillery shells, but not fire-arms.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_coalitionmedhelmet: Same as a normal helmet, but red with a white cross for medic identification.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_renegadehelmet: A flat rim helmet with netting over the top. Protective against artillery shells, but not gun-fire.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_renegademedhelmet: Similar to a standard helmet, but red with a white cross for medic identification.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_renegadecomhat: A fine piece of Separatist headgear. Simply wearing this can inspire confidence in those around you.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_coalitioncomhat: Headdress for any stalwart Coalition officer.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_faceplate: A steel mask providing solid protection from gunshots, at least from the front.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_coalitiongear: Standard issue equipment for Coalition soldiers. Has pockets to hold anything from meds to ammo.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_coalitionmedgear: Standard issue rig for Coalition physicians. Has surgical gear that makes medical procedures more effective.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_coalitionenggear: Standard issue rig for Coalition sappers. Has repair tools to make maintenance faster, and also has packs capable of carrying defenses.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_coalitionarmor: Bolted steel plates for highly effective protection. Useful for assault troops and machinegunners.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_renegadegear: Renegade's gear: a waist belt with pockets, tied together with a camo colored bandolier.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_renegademedgear: Renegade medic's gear: two large side packs on a waist belt, and a medical bandolier filled with surgical equipment.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_renegadeenggear: Basic rig pockets and bandolier replaced with packs for equipment and material storage. Has repair tools to make maintenance faster, and also has packs capable of carrying defenses.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_renegadearmor: Heavy duty shaped steel for highly effective protection. Useful for assault troops and machinegunners.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_coalitionuniform: Standard issue uniform consisting of a horizon blue tunic, trousers and ankle boots topped with puttees.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_renegadeuniform: A uniform consisting of a army green trench coat, trousers and boots topped with leg wraps.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_strategicexchange: A place were ammo and weapons from the home front are sent and, with the right amount money, can be bought.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_townfabricator: Field contructed work bench. Take zero materials to build basic defenses.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_refinery: Used to turn raw ore into materials.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_oredrill: Spawns basic ore scaling to the amount of players on the server.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_basicmaterial: Used in the contruction of basic items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_advancedmaterial: Used in fabrication of powerful items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_riflecrate: Produces 4 rifles. Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_shotguncrate: Produces 4 shotguns. Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_smgcrate: Produces 2 smgs. Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_hmgcrate: Produces a hmg. Deposit in a locker to retrieve item.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_rifleammocrate: Produces 48 full power rounds. Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_shotgunammocrate: Produces 48 shotgun shells. Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_smgammocrate: Produces 2 submachine gun magazines and 80 pistol cartridges. Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_hmgammocrate: Produces 4 machine gun magazines. Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_medicalcrate: Produces assorted medical items (blood not included). Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_bloodcrate: Produces 6 saline and 2 blood packs. Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_grenadecrate: Produces 4 frag grenades. Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_dynamitecrate: Produces 2 dynamite. Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_barbedwirecrate: Produces 4 barb wire. Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_sandbagcrate: Produces 4 pallets of sandbags. Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_flamethrowercrate: Produces 2 flamethrowers. Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_coalitionshellcrate: Produces 6 large caliber shells. Deposit in a shelf to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_coalitionbodyarmorc: Produces 2 armor and face plates. Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_coalitiongasgrenade: Produces 6 throwable grenades and 3 rifle grenades. Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_renegadeshellcrate: Produces a box of small caliber shells. Deposit in a shelf to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_renegadebodyarmorcr: Produces 2 armor and face plates. Deposit in a locker to retrieve items.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_currency: A brass coin made as a alternative to the Mark to better withstand battlefield conditions. Respected, produced and used by both the Coalition and Renegades.
infotexts.entitydescription.WR_footlocker: Stores the belongings of a captive.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.WR_suppression: Your accuracy and composure is compromised by fear.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.WR_cardiacarrest: The patient's heart is beating in a unusual pattern and their skin is getting paler.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.WR_cardiacarrest.h: You find no pulse and the patient's skin is ice cold.
